name: ArtifactEscape
description:
Created for the Mini Jam 61: Ancient Egypt

Went with the theme of Indiana Jones trying to escape an Egyptian temple.  The limitation was "The game must be themed around two conflicting ideas"
We attempted to accomplish this by having a rougelike where you cannot attack. 

This idea evolved a bit into a game where you are running and dodging traps. and can lead the enemies into the traps to kill them.

Controls:

WASD - Move
E - Pickup/Use
Space - Dash

Credits:

Evan Malmud - Programming/Design
Dennis Pinato - Art
Pun - SFX
